description:
ListItem component represents an interactive item in a list with optional
decorators, label, subtitle, and selection states.
name: ListItem

tags.name: example
tags.text:
Basic usage
<List>
<ListItem
label="Settings"
onClick={() => navigate('/settings')}
/>
<ListItem
label="Profile"
onClick={() => navigate('/profile')}
/>
</List>

tags.name: example
tags.text:
With icons and subtitles
<ListItem
decorator={<SettingsIcon size={24} />}
label="Account Settings"
subtitle="User preferences and security options"
onClick={handleSettingsClick}
/>

tags.name: example
example
example
tags.text:
Disabled state
<ListItem
label="Premium Feature"
subtitle="Upgrade your plan to access"
disabled={true}
onClick={handlePremiumClick}
/>
